content: अभियोगः {@--1@} Application or devotion (to some thing); connection; गुरुचर्यातपस्तंत्रमंत्रयोगाभियोगजां <ls>Māl. 9. 51</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Close application, perseverance, zealous intentness, energetic effort, exertion; °भाज् persevering, resolute <ls>Ki. 3. 40</ls>; संतः स्वयं परहितेषु कृताभियोगाः <ls>Bh. 2. 73</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 34</ls>; मत्प्रियाभियोगेन <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; तदभियोगं प्रति निरुद्योगः <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; स्वयमभियोगदुःखैः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; <ls>Dk. 41</ls>, <ls>K. 345</ls>; <ls>Śi. 7. 63.</ls> {@--3@} ({%a%}) Application or devotion to learn something; कस्यां कलायामभियोगो भवत्योः <ls>M. 5</ls> to what art have you applied or devoted yourselves; <ls>K. 109.</ls> ({%b%}) Learning, scholarship; अनभियोगश्च शब्दादेरशिष्टानां अभियोगश्चेतरेषां <ls>Śabarasvāmin</ls>. {@--4@} ({%a%}) Attack, assault; invasion (of a town or country); क्षुभितं वनगोचराभियोगात् <ls>Ki. 13. 10</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">2. 46</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 50</ls>; <ls>Ve. 4</ls>; <ls>Māl. 8</ls>, <ls>Mu. 2</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">1. 7</ls>, <ls>Mv. 6. 38.</ls> ({%b%}) Battle, war, conflict. {@--5@} (In law) A charge, accusation, plaint, indictment; अभियोगमनिस्तीर्य नैनं प्रत्यभियोजयेत् <ls>Y. 2. 9.</ls>
